name: Maxwell Keith Price
description: I’m open and very sociable person, I have a good sense of humor, I’m cheerful, kind, sympathetic and faithful but I am still lonely in this huge world. I meet all challenges with a smile and it helps me to cope with them. I consider myself to be an optimist in this life. Being affectionate, gentle, considerate and caring I have my heart full of love and I want to give love and be loved, I still waiting for the right one who would share with me all the joys and gifts of life. I’m waiting for the woman who would give me his care, attention and most importantly his affection. I want our relations bright, clean, hot and long-lasting. I want to see a successful, respectful, intelligent, witty and natural woman with me. Greediness and lie cannot strengthen a relationship. I hate lies. The most important thing for me is understanding, inner comfort and a mutual desire to be happy together. I would like to meet nice, tender, open and understanding person.
